text.#text: Not later than one year after the date of enactment of this Act, the

header.#text: Limitations on the application of the Controlled Substances Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall prohibit or otherwise restrict in a State in which the medical use of marijuana is legal under State law—

text.#text: the prescription or recommendation of marijuana for medical use by a medical professional or the certification by a medical professional that a patient has a condition for which marijuana may have therapeutic benefit;
an individual from obtaining, manufacturing, possessing, or transporting within their State marijuana for medical purposes, provided the activities are authorized under State law; or

a pharmacy or other entity authorized under local or State law to distribute medical marijuana to individuals authorized to possess medical marijuana under State law from obtaining, possessing or distributing marijuana to such individuals.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall prohibit or otherwise restrict an entity authorized by a State or local government, in a State in which the possession and use of marijuana for medical purposes is legal from producing, processing, or distributing marijuana for such purposes.

header.#text: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall prohibit or otherwise restrict in a State in which the medical use of marijuana is legal under State law—

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act

text.#text: the prescription or recommendation of marijuana for medical use by a medical professional or the certification by a medical professional that a patient has a condition for which marijuana may have therapeutic benefit;
an individual from obtaining, manufacturing, possessing, or transporting within their State marijuana for medical purposes, provided the activities are authorized under State law; or

a pharmacy or other entity authorized under local or State law to distribute medical marijuana to individuals authorized to possess medical marijuana under State law from obtaining, possessing, or distributing marijuana to such individuals.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall prohibit or otherwise restrict an entity authorized by a State or local government, in a State in which the possession and use of marijuana for medical purposes is legal from producing, processing, or distributing marijuana for such purpose.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act

text.#text: Not later than 180 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: for control over access to marijuana for research into its potential therapeutic and medicinal uses to an entity of the Executive Branch that is not focused on researching the addictive properties of substances. That entity shall take appropriate actions to ensure that an adequate supply of marijuana is available for therapeutic and medicinal research.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 303(f) of the Controlled Substances Act

header.#text: Administration of registration requirements related to marijuana research

text.#text: This Act does not affect any Federal, State, or local law regulating or prohibiting smoking in public.
